items.sentence: Even if I knew where Tom was, I wouldn\'t tell you.
I\'ve already told Tom I don\'t plan on doing that.
I\'ve already told Tom he doesn\'t need to do that.
I\'ve already told everybody I\'m moving to Boston.
It\'ll take some time to get used to wearing a wig.
It\'ll take us three, maybe four weeks at the most.
It\'s a good thing you have your umbrella with you.
It\'s better to be born lucky than to be born rich.
It\'s difficult to get out of bed on cold mornings.
Tom doesn\'t speak French and Mary doesn\'t either.
I\'d like to drive across the USA in a convertible.
I\'d like to talk to the doctor alone for a moment.
I\'d like you to translate this report into French.
I\'ll never forget your kindness as long as I live.
I\'m almost certain it was Tom who stole my wallet.
I didn\'t start wearing glasses until I was thirty.
I don\'t think that Tom knows anyone at our school.
Would you tell Tom why you don\'t enjoy doing that?
Wouldn\'t it be better if you did that by yourself?
Yesterday, Tom told me he didn\'t know how to swim.
You aren\'t allowed to bring food into the library.
I hope Tom didn\'t do what you asked him not to do.
I hope you\'ve learned something from your mistake.
I told you guys to go home. Why are you still here?
I took time off from work and went to the hospital.
Tom and Mary haven\'t unpacked their suitcases yet.
Tom wouldn\'t have been able to do that without me.
There\'s no need to panic. There\'s plenty of time.
Tom is too drunk to drive. Could you take him home?
Tom is very proud of both his son and his daughter.
Tom locked the door after he entered his apartment.
Tom dressed himself quickly, then ran out the door.
My driver\'s license is valid for three more years.
My physics teacher doesn\'t care if I skip classes.
If you don\'t like this, you don\'t have to eat it.
Tom is only five, but he already knows how to read.
Tom is only given fifteen minutes to eat his lunch.
Tom is only supposed to have one visitor at a time.
Tom is perfectly capable of taking care of himself.
Tom is perfectly satisfied with his current salary.
We\'re going to my folks\' for Christmas this year.
Two men are checking on what\'s wrong with the car.
We\'ve got to do something about this problem soon.
Common sense tells me this isn\'t the way to do it.
I don\'t think Tom will do what we asked him to do.
Revolutions that don\'t succeed are soon forgotten.
She couldn\'t convince him to write a song for her.
Empty your pockets and put everything on the table.
Don\'t blame them for what happened back in Boston.
You\'re the best thing that\'s ever happened to me.
